scopes.description: A list of all OAuth scopes used by this API

key.description: The key/identifier used to refer to this scope (lowercase, separate words with a colon(:)).

name.description: The human friendly name for this scope (sentence case). This is shown to users in the OAuth journey and in documentation,

description.description: The description for this scope (recommendation set this to the same value as the name)

confidenceLevel.description: The Identity Verification confidence level required to use this scope. Value can be 50, 100, 200 or 300. See [Identity Verification on the API Platform](https://confluence.tools.tax.service.gov.uk/display/DTRG/Identity+Verification+on+the+API+Platform)

name.description: The name for the API (title case i.e. Individual Benefits, not Individual benefits).

context.description: The unique context for the API. This should be consistent with the HMRC Domain Model. See [API Domain Model](https://confluence.tools.tax.service.gov.uk/display/ApiPlatform/HMRC%27s+API+Domain+Model)

isTestSupport.description: Categorises the API as being a Test Support API

requiresTrust.description: DEPRECATED. This has been superseded by Private API access

categories.description: The list of service groups the API will be categorised by.

versions.description: A list of the different versions of the API

status.description: The current lifecycle status. PROTOTYPED and PUBLISHED should not be used. See [Lifecycle]

endpointsEnabled.description: Whether the endpoints are enabled. This value MUST be false if the API versions status is ALPHA

access.description: Used to indicate whether this API version is public or private. If absent, the API defaults to public. See [Access]

type.description: Whether the API version is publicly available or only for private use.

whitelistedApplicationIds.description: DEPRECATED. This is no longer used. Please contact SDST to add applications to the allowlist.

isTrial.description: Whether this API version is a private trial

fieldDefinitions.description: A list of subscription fields for this API version.

items.description: Details a subscription field used by this API. If you would like to use subscription fields you should talk to the API Platform team first #team-api-platform-sup.

name.description: The internal identifier for this field

description.description: The description that will be shown to users for this field

type.description: The type of value expected for this field

hint.description: Hint text to display to users to help them provide a correct value for this field

shortDescription.description: A short description that is displayed on the API metadata page

validation.description: Contains Rules to validate the value of the Field Definition.

errorMessage.description: The error message that will be shown to users if this field is invalid.

rules.description: An array of Validation Rules to validate the field's value.

items.description: A Validation Rule to validate the field value.

RegexValidationRule.description: A Regex Rule to validate the field value.

regex.description: Regex to validate the field value.

UrlValidationRule.description: A URL Rule to validate a URL field.

access.description: Access control for the value of this Subscription Field

devhub.description: Access control within Developer Hub for the value of this Subscription Field

read.description: Who going to have Read Access to the value of this Subscription Field

write.description: Who going to have Write Access to the value of this Subscription Field
